summary: All the characters from my screenshots available for download
descriptionHtml:
-DESCRIPTION-

This is the first mod I upload here on the nexus;

It is a compilation of six save files and a \"meshes and textures\" pack added to allow you to get the same look as in the screenshots.

I\'m uploading the save files on their own and another file with the textures and meshes i used for faces and bodies.

Given i\'ve read many of the comments i\'ll place this right at the top of the description:

THIS IS NOT A FOLLOWER MOD, i\'m sorry but i don\'t know how to underline text so i\'ll just use capital letters :)

These are only save files with a pack of textures and meshes for the base body and makeup which, if applied, will replace the base body and textures of all your vanilla female characters (which will look better this way in my opinion, but that\'s only my personal preference :D)

Other than that, I\'m not a modder myself, I don\'t know how to create a follower mod or how to use the CK, so if anyone is willing to create a follower mod using my characters you\'re more than welcome to do it and share it with the community; all i ask is, in case that you do, that you just remember to give me a quick mention around the credits

-REQUIREMENTS-

Apachii SkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Nouks hairstyles by zzjay http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26689
UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899
Skyrim Script Extender http://skse.silverlock.org/ (I don\'t know if this is necessary but i had it)
Dawnguard (none of the characters has anything active from the dawnguard DLC, still it\'s present as a master file, so it could be an issue if you want to use the save files directly and not just the faces)

-INSTALLATION-

Install the \"REQUIREMENTS\" first, then
IF you want to get the exact looks of the screenshots, Install the Textures and Meshes (decompress and copy-paste over the Data folder of your Skyrim game or use the mod manager), then...

There are two ways you can make this work:

1) 
copy the saves into your skyrim saves folder, default -My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves, try to load the saves from there and pray that none of the mods that were active while i saved those characters will make the save unuseable
I\'ve put the .skse files into the archives too, where they were present, should the script extender need them to load the save

OR

2)
use the Skyrim Face Transfer at this link http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15307 and copy the face from one of my save files to one of your save files to paste one of my character\'s faces on your own character; this way mods shouldn\'t be interfering

-NOTE-

Given i mixed many make up, body and face mods i don\'t actually remember who to give credit to, so I\'ll just remark that none of these textures or meshes are my personal work, I just made a copy-paste work, nothing more...
With this said you can use my characters in any mods/ways you fancy, just give me a quick mention if you do.
By the way, if anyone recognises any specific texture or work from a mod on the nexus, place it in the comments or pm me, i\'ll add it in the credits

-CREDITS-

UNPB Body 
Apachii SkyHair 
Fair Skin Complexion 
Eyebrows Match Hair 
Nouks hairstyles by zzjay 


-P.S.-

The armors in the screens are from:
\"Huntress\" from http://mod.dysintropi.me/mods/skyrim/
\"TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846
\"Dovahkiin Mercenary Gear - UNP\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15804
\"Bouncy Bodices and Booties\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21271
\"Ashara Princess of the Woods - UNP\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008
\"Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22166
\"Theminblacks UNPB Armor Shop\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19004
\"Winter Is Coming - Cloaks\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486
\"TAKE NEW SLOT Glasses Ears Earring\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11068
\"Silver Armor\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22971
\"Temptress Armor / Vixen Outfit\" from \"Temptress Race\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717
\"Maxwell Outfit - UNP\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14668
\"Lustmord Vampire Armor\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852
\"UNP Jewelry\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13061
\"The Art of Magicka\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040

The tattooed and muscular skins are from:
\"Feminine Symbolic Tattoos_for UNP - UNPB\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28293/
\"Sporty Sexy Map\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377/
\"Sporty Sexy Sweat\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946/
I stopped using them quite a while ago, but since they were in the screenshots i thought i could mention them :)
